text: @markmobility 99.99999999% of them will be @realDonaldTrump supporters.....ie. thick as pig shit!!!! Absolute bunch of morons!! The Covid-19 death toll in America is currently 100K.. I would not be surprised if it ends up at 1M!! Incomprehensible dumbfuckery of the highest order!! #trumptards
